text: @FriendEden100 Last I checked, Alex Azar who's an "American attorney, former pharmaceutical industry lobbyist & executive, and current Presidential cabinet member". He does not hold a Medical or  Public Health degree. He has no business controlling the COVID19 data, that doctors need access to!
